answerText: Doppler Effect[10] The inverse Doppler Effect requires materials with this property that causes the electric and magnetic fields to be in left-handed coordinates as opposed to the standard right-handed coordinates. Photonic crystals can have this property, which was described in part by Victer Veselago.
heading: Missiles of October |2011 | 8 | 10 | Science | Physics | College
subject: Science
question: Question: Recently, the inverse of this effect has been observed in the visible spectrum. For 10 points each: [10] Name this effect that causes a change in observed frequency if two objects are moving relative to each other. It causes redshift.
